item.title: Instructions for the usage of Markdown
item.description: Fonte: https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet Autor: Adam Pritchard Modificado por: Rafael Markdown é uma linguagem de marcação utilizada nas publicações deste site. Table of contents To include table of contents conditionally, edit the file single.html in the directory /themes/hugo-coder/layouts/posts: Locate the line: {{ partial "post_meta.html" . }} Below it, add the following: {{ if .Params.toc }} {{ .TableOfContents }} {{ end }} To enable Table of Contents set toc = true on the header.
